Episodes.Title: Pilot: The First Seventeen Hours
Episodes.Plot: After a nuclear disaster caused by several terrorist attacks wipes out most of North America, residents of a small Kansas town have to come to terms with a very different reality.
Episodes.GuestStars: Taylor Nichols, Leon Russom, Joey King, Joseph Castanon, Germaine De Leon, Beau Dremann, Steve Hibbert, Helena Barrett, Madison Pettis, Mackenzie Hannigan, Al Vincente, Marlene Forte, Thom Williams, Robert C. Koc

Episodes.Title: Fallout
Episodes.Plot: The fallout from the nuclear blast in Denver will hit Jericho in an hour and Jake has to get the residents inside.  The official shelter is not adequate and Jake must find another shelter to protect them. Emily faces troubles of her own while being picked up by who she thinks are two officers.
Episodes.GuestStars: Musashi Alexander, Julia M. Flint, Chris Foreman, Geffri Maya Hightower, Todd Giebenhain, Jeff De Serrano, Aaron Hendry, Jonno Roberts

Episodes.Title: Four Horsemen
Episodes.Plot: After seeing a broadcast via satellite from Asia, Jake gathers a group of people together for information gathering.  After finding out that there is information out there, Jake suggests having four search parties to go out to get a better understanding what is going on outside of Jericho.  The search parties set off in four different directions.
Episodes.GuestStars: Mackenzie Hannigan, Xiaobin Jiang, James Eckhouse, Bobby Stephenson

Episodes.Title: Walls Of Jericho
Episodes.Plot: Jake finds a stranger who is sick with radiation poisoning and he must make a decision whether or not to help him.  The hospital?s generator is running out of gas and the residents find that their supplies are also running low.
Episodes.GuestStars: Thomas Bankowski, April D Parker, Bobby Stephenson, Darby Stachfield, Adam Donshik, Yvans Jourdain

Episodes.Title: Federal Response
Episodes.Plot: The children of Jericho start to return back to school. A power line that has fallen causes an accident on the playground when the power returns. Jake has an argument with his mother regarding a secret that Jake hasn't disclosed to his dad.
Episodes.GuestStars: George Hammett, Mackenzie Hannigan, Stevie Walsh Jr., Hailey McCann, Bobby Stephenson

Episodes.Plot: Hawkins must step in when an argument between Jake and an adversary becomes heated.  After an electromagnetic pulse leaves Jericho in the dark crime runs rampant. Later, Jake is held at gunpoint and is rescued.
Episodes.GuestStars: Musashi Alexander, Reid Godshaw, Cari Zoch, Clayne Crawford

Episodes.Title: Long Live The Mayor
Episodes.Plot: The slick gang leader Jonah bails Mitchell out of jail and agrees to give back the food that his bandits stole and agrees to keep out of Jericho. This plan strays off-course as Jonah negotiates new terms involving Jake and Emily.
Episodes.GuestStars: Clayne Crawford, Doug Spinuzza, Beth Grant

Episodes.Title: Rogue River
Episodes.Plot: Jake and Eric head out of Jericho to the nearby town of Rogue River to try and acquire some medicine for their father.  While the brothers are at the hospital they encounter a combative group of individuals who call themselves Ravenwood. The brothers find that they?re trapped and must find a way back to Jericho.
Episodes.GuestStars: Theo Rossi, D.B. Sweeney, Aasif Mandvi

Episodes.Title: Crossroads
Episodes.Plot: The residents of Jericho receive a visit from a group of questionable outsiders and they realize that they need to form a plan to keep the outsiders out. Emily has a dream about her wedding morning to Roger. She wakes up and realizes that he is probably dead.
Episodes.GuestStars: D.B. Sweeney, Aasif Mandvi, James Remar

Episodes.Title: Red Flag
Episodes.Plot: Supplies are dropped by air into Jericho and the Green's and Hawkins think that they know where they came from. Jonah Prowse returns to Jericho causing even more trouble.
Episodes.GuestStars: Patrick Rowe, Beth Grant, Clayne Crawford, James Remar

Episodes.Title: Vox Populi
Episodes.Plot: Some of the residents of Jericho are concerned that Gray's actions may actually make Gray the new mayor. In other news, Mitchell claims that Jonah is the killer under much speculation.
Episodes.GuestStars: Clayne Crawford, Aasif Mandvi, Beth Grant, James Remar

Episodes.Title: The Day Before
Episodes.Plot: The lives of Jake and Hawkins are explored during this flashback episode. This episode begins 36 hours before the bombs went off. Sarah is introduced and is associated to Hawkins. Jake had been living in San Diego.
Episodes.GuestStars: Erica Munoz,  Andrew Borba,  Rob Swanson,  Milby Barron,  James Parks,  Maurice Godin,  Mark Adair-Rios,  Darby Stanchfield,  April D Parker

Episodes.Title: Black Jack
Episodes.Plot: Jake, his dad, Heather and Dale visit Black Jack to try and find the parts needed to fix the windmill. Sarah goes home with Hawkins against the rest of his family's wishes.
Episodes.GuestStars: Dustin Seavey, Dan Sachoff, Christopher Weihl, Michael Rubenstone, David Meunier, Dennis W. Hall, John Diehl, Christopher Darga, Tim Sitarz

Episodes.Title: Heart Of Winter
Episodes.Plot: While on a hunting trip outside of Jericho, Jake, Stanley and Mimi find themselves in a dangerous situation when they run into some strangers.  Meanwhile, Hawkins realizes that his family is in danger because of him. Emily and Roger work on their relationship.
Episodes.GuestStars: April D. Parker, Siena Goines, Darby Stanchfield, Christopher Dinh, Cari Zoch, Chris Foreman, Ron Bottitta, Christopher Weihl

Episodes.Title: Semper Fidelis
Episodes.Plot: After a company of Marines show up, the town of Jericho has hopes that life will finally start to return to normal. However, their behavior raises Jake's and Johnston's suspicions.
Episodes.GuestStars: Clare Carey,  James McDonald,  Erin Daniels,  Tim Barraco,  Jason Collins,  Darby Stanchfield

Episodes.Title: Winter's End
Episodes.Plot: After April collapses and goes into early labor, Jake makes Kenchy face his problems so that they can save April. The wind turbine arrives from New Bern but Heather does not return. Jericho makes a deal with New Bern to send ten of their people to New Bern to make more wind turbines as long as New Bern receives a percentage of their spring crop.
Episodes.GuestStars: Timothy Omundson, Erica Tazel, David Meunier, Janet Hoskins, Jerry Giles, Clare Carey, Darby Stanchfield, Aasif Mandvi, Ron Bottitta, Beau Dremann

Episodes.Title: One Man's Terrorist
Episodes.Plot:
Roger gets desperate after Gray kicks the refugees out of Jericho. Dale and Skylar collect on some debts. Hawkins continues his quest to find Sarah's contacts.
Meanwhile, Hawkins begins the process of finding who's coming after him.
Episodes.GuestStars: Josh Wheeler,  Daniel Benzali,  Ned Schmidtke,  Jeff Parise,  Warren Sweeney,  Bob Stephenson,  Ron Bottitta,  Adam Donshik,  Mia Ford,  Ryan Tutton,  Erica Tazel,  Candace Bailey,  Dan Sachoff

Episodes.Title: A.K.A.
Episodes.Plot: Jake finds that Hawkins has not been honest with the residents of Jericho about his past and holds him at gunpoint for answers.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bob Stephenson,  Jazz Raycole,  Clare Carey,  Siena Goines,  Daniel Benzali

Episodes.Title: Casus Belli
Episodes.Plot: Jake believes something more is wrong after Eric doesn?t return from New Bern. Jake and Hawkins go to New Bern and discover that Jericho is in danger.
Episodes.GuestStars: Clare Carey,  Candace Bailey,  Bob Stephenson,  Jeff Parise,  Chad Christopher Tucker,  Chet Grissom,  Ronnie Steadman,  Ned Bellamy,  Timothy Omundson,  Dustin Seavey,  David Meunier

Episodes.Title: One If By Land
Episodes.Plot: The hostility mounts between the citizens of Jericho and New Bern. A handful of residents of New Bern are shot and injured after getting caught trying to steal from the Jericho salt mine.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ryan Coughlin, David Meunier, Dustin Seavey, Chet Grissom, Dan Sachoff, Joseph Bucaro

Episodes.Title: Coalition of the Willing
Episodes.Plot: The residents of Jericho and New Bern fight over precious resources and Gray  must make a tough decision after the streets of Jericho are bombed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robert Reinis, Brian Silverman, Robert Dolan, Richard Speight Jr., Clare Carey, James Remar

Episodes.Title: Why We Fight
Episodes.Plot: The battle with New Bern ensues, with Jericho residents out-manned and out-gunned, but not outsmarted. Jericho gains the upper hand but suffers a significant casualty. A friend of Jake's sends help from an unexpected source.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kassim Osgood, Patrick E. Wymore, Emily Swallow, David Huddleston, Titus Welliver, Tripp Pickell, Daniel Benzali
